oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett to his mother, Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett (regarding his brother PFC Curtis Scott "Bannie" Bennett)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett (1892-1951) served in Btry. F, 318th FA Regt., 81st Div. during World War I. The letter is addressed to his mother, Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett, in Huntingdon, Tennessee. He tells his mother about news from his brother, PFC Curtis Scott "Bannie" Bennett and briefly describes his service in France.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
